Finally,  we have the following theorem. 
Theorem 5.  4.  Let the notation be that of Lemma 5.  1.  Let u { x,  y ) be an entire GBSHE function with a series representation in terms of Bessel Jacobi functions as given in ( 2.  4 ). Furthermore ^ if | Ü 2 n \ ^ for some Д > 1 and any a > 0,  provided n is

This follows at once from Lemmas 1 and 5.  3.  One can also obtain a lower bound on the maximum modulus by use of Theorem 5.  2.
